name: 3D Printer Control V1
summary: Desktop app + ESP32 firmware for basic printer controls.
description: Modern control UI with jog, temperature, and job monitor. Includes trial .exe and documentation.

name: Plasma Cutter Control V1
summary: PyQt GUI with DXF/SVG import and kerf compensation.
description: Full-featured plasma cutting control interface with material DB and sensor feedback.

name: ECU/TCU Control System V1
summary: Engine & gearbox control UI with profiles and logging.
description: Modern & Legacy variants, dashboard gauges, sensor calibration, advanced logging.

name: Fridge/Freezer Control V1
summary: Temperature control with alerts and energy optimization.
description: Compact control system with sensor monitoring and setpoint management.

name: Nano GSM Gate Controller V1
description: Supports admin numbers, STATUS polling, and remote control via SMS.

name: Solar Energy Management System V1
summary: Solar PV monitoring and automated load management.
description: Dashboards, alerts, and device integration for efficient energy use.

name: Hybrid Gate Controller V1
summary: Wi‑Fi primary with GSM fallback gate controller.
description: Selectable primary channel, auto-fallback, and signal polling.

name: 12CH Hybrid Alarm V1
description: Wi‑Fi primary, GSM fallback, zone enable/disable, RF arm/disarm customization.

name: 16CH Hybrid Alarm V1
description: Signal polling, large dashboard, panic modes, and zone triggers.

name: TCU Gearbox Controller V1
description: Reverse lockout, serial/CAN, profiles, and firmware version check.
